publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5403 Patricia Ferguson: Queens Cross Gets Goldâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Queens Cross Housing Association on achieving a Gold Healthy Working Lives Award for its work in the areas of health and environment, employability and community health and wellbeing; notes that the association is now aiming for a Mental Health Commendation Award, and wishes it well in its endeavours.
S3M-5403 Queens Cross Gets Gold (lodged on 11 December 2009) Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Cathy Jamieson*, Pauline McNeill*, Bill Butler*
S3M-5403 Queens Cross Gets Gold (lodged on 11 December 2009) Sarah Boyack*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Whitefield*
